About Us

Goals and mission of the company

Who we are?

We are focussed to deliver easily manageable solutions based on cutting edge IoT technology which will direclty impact the daily business activities of any company. We identify the pain points in you existing businesses and give solutions to overcome them with our easily integrable solutions.

Our vision

To build the infrastructure required to allow customers to outsource all their transportation needs domestically, internationally, and globally.

Our mission

To provide zero-defect quality fleet management with advanced computer technology, in an efficient and customer-driven manner, resulting in total satisfaction for our customers.

Mine

Corruption, fraud and illegal operations are persistent problems for the mining industry in India.Taylor heyman explores the sophisticated, sensor based tracking systems being used to address the project

  • Service: Mining based solution

Sand solution

How district level administration of sand ecosystem can serve the community better with sustainable mining and transportation through operational excellence, transparenct, accountability and efficiency.

  • Service: Sand transport operations

Self drive solutions

Solution for the emerging and rapidly growing wise transportation segment. Transportation in India is currently predominated by the chauffer driven model of car rentals and it has witnessed massive growth in the past few years.

  • Service: Self drive operations

Wise Move

It is a unique integrated IoT business model for Automotive logistics that is cost effective, increases visibility, efficiency and profitability.We connect stake holders with Supply chain in a shared view environment enabling real time communication and providing access to decision making data.

  • Service: Logistics operations

Cargo soluions

Express cargo is a premium segment of the logistics industry. Includes features like ontime secure consignment delivery, improved efficiency of filed operations, optimization of route and asset utilization, improved vehicle and route performance and improved customer satisfaction.

  • Service: Express Cargo operations

Distribution Logistics

With e-commerce/m-commerce there has been rapid growth in distribution logisticss. Our solutions come with features like Temperature monitoring, proprietary ERP integrations, fleet management, Route optimization, vehicle tracking and consignment tracking.

  • Service: Logistics operations
